Layout.title: PicMe - SEO-Friendly Image Optimizer
Layout.description: Optimize your product images for SEO with simple adjustments to white balance, contrast, and size.
Layout.keywords: image optimization, SEO images, product photos, white balance, image batch processing

Pricing.title: PRICING PLANS
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your image optimization needs. Our PRO plan offers a lifetime license with a one-time payment.

alreadyPro.title: You're already a PRO user!
alreadyPro.description: Thank you for your support. You have access to all PRO features including bulk background removal, advanced image adjustments, and SEO filename generation.

checkout.title: COMPLETE YOUR PURCHASE
checkout.description: One-time payment, lifetime access to all PRO features

free.title: FREE
features: Process up to 10 images at once

pro.title: PRO
features: Process up to 100 images at once

oneTime.question: Is this really a one-time payment?
oneTime.answer: Yes! Pay once and get lifetime access to all PRO features. No recurring subscriptions.

backgroundRemoval.question: How does background removal work?
backgroundRemoval.answer: We use advanced AI algorithms to detect and remove backgrounds from your product images. The entire process happens in your browser - we never store your images on our servers.

imageLimits.question: What are the image limits?
imageLimits.answer: Free users can process up to 10 images at once with basic features and remove the background from 1 image at a time. PRO users can process up to 100 images simultaneously, including bulk background removal.

refund.question: Can I request a refund?
refund.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the PRO features. Contact our support team for assistance.

PrivacyPolicy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
PrivacyPolicy.section1P1: Welcome to PICME (“we”, “our”, “us”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.section1P2: This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your data when you use our browser-based image optimization tool.
PrivacyPolicy.section2P1Bold: We do not collect or store your images.
PrivacyPolicy.section2P2: PICME operates entirely within your browser. When you upload images to optimize:
PrivacyPolicy.section2Li1: Your images are processed locally in your browser using client-side JavaScript.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Li2: Your images never leave your device and are not transmitted to our servers.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Li3: We do not store copies of your original or processed images.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Li4: We do not track the content of your images.
PrivacyPolicy.section3P1: When you use our AI-powered SEO name generation features:
PrivacyPolicy.section3Li1: We send only the descriptive text you provide to our API.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Li2: We do not send or process your actual images through our AI systems.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Li3: Your generated SEO names are delivered back to your browser and are not permanently stored on our servers.
PrivacyPolicy.section4P1: We use minimal analytics to understand how our site is used:
PrivacyPolicy.section4Li1: We collect anonymous usage statistics like page views and feature usage.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Li2: We use essential cookies to provide functionality like reCAPTCHA protection.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Li3: We do not use cookies for advertising or tracking across other websites.
PrivacyPolicy.section5P1: We use the following third-party services:
PrivacyPolicy.section5Li1: Google reCAPTCHA for spam protection on our AI features.
PrivacyPolicy.section5Li2: OpenCV.js for image processing (runs entirely in your browser).
PrivacyPolicy.section5P2: Each of these services has its own privacy policy governing how they handle data.
PrivacyPolicy.section6P1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
PrivacyPolicy.section7P1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@picme-app.com.

TermsOfUse.title: TERMS OF USE
TermsOfUse.section1P1: By accessing and using PICME, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use our service.
TermsOfUse.section2P1: PICME is a browser-based image optimization tool that allows users to:
TermsOfUse.section2Li1: Adjust image properties such as brightness, contrast, and white balance
TermsOfUse.section2Li2: Resize and optimize images for web use
TermsOfUse.section2P2: All image processing occurs locally in your browser; no images are uploaded to or stored on our servers.
TermsOfUse.section3P1: Users of PICME are responsible for:
TermsOfUse.section3Li1: Ensuring they have the necessary rights and permissions to modify the images they process
TermsOfUse.section3Li2: Using the service in compliance with applicable laws and regulations
TermsOfUse.section3Li3: Not using the service to process, create, or distribute inappropriate, offensive, or illegal content
TermsOfUse.section3Li4: Not attempting to reverse engineer, modify, or hack the service
TermsOfUse.section4P1: All original content, features, and functionality of PICME are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
TermsOfUse.section4P2: You retain all rights to your original images. We claim no ownership over the images you process using our service.
TermsOfUse.section5Li1: PICME is provided “as is” and “as available” without any warranties of any kind.
TermsOfUse.section5Li2: We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
TermsOfUse.section5Li3: We are not responsible for any loss of data that may occur during processing.
TermsOfUse.section5Li4: We make no warranties regarding the accuracy or effectiveness of the SEO name generation feature.
TermsOfUse.section6P1: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.
TermsOfUse.section7P1: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of PICME at any time without prior notice or liability.
TermsOfUse.section8P1: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which we operate, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
TermsOfUse.section9P1: We may update these Terms of Use from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the “Last Updated” date.
TermsOfUse.section10P1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at terms@picme-app.com.
